list_definition.definition: a supply of eg goods from which things are taken when required

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They took a store of dried and canned food on the expedition

list_definition.definition: a place where a supply of goods etc is kept; a storehouse or storeroom

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The post office here is also the village store

list_definition.definition: to put into a place for keeping

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We stored our furniture in the attic while the tenants used our house.

list_definition.definition: to stock (a place etc) with goods etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The museum is stored with interesting exhibits.
